channel.title: 3 Month Membership Card [HURRY]
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm quitting RuneScape, my original card that I've used in the past just ran out, and I'm quitting either way since I'm packing my stuff and leaving for college within these next three months
Seeing as I don't know what to get my brother for his birthday in 4 days, and he looooves RuneScape, I would like to sell my 3 Month Membership card with the code and everything, it's still valid.
In return for this, I'd like you to give some RSGP (RuneScape Gold Pieces) to my brother.
The highest bid will receive the card pretty much. Current bid starts at 10M
Reply with your username in-game, or I could add you on msn, or we could tinychat.
TLDR; 3 month membership card laying around, selling for rsgp for my brothers birthday present, bid.
Thanks! - TremblayX

item.title: 3 Month Membership Card [HURRY]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

There’s a reason we dont allow buying or selling, things like this are probably a scam.

Read full topic

item.title: 3 Month Membership Card [HURRY]
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“buut15, post:6, topic:407426”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=508712.msg3690629#msg3690629 date=1312094676]
Also I get my membership codes free cause a friend of mine works as best buy, they use the display models to buy code id’s
[/quote]
Lucky person. =P[/quote]
I got 3 years of world of warcraft that I’m probably going to give away on here too, wasn’t even worth typing in the pin to get it free lol, that game sucks.

Read full topic

item.description:
@TremblayX wrote:

Because we both got a 3 month card from the store from our parents, he used his not too long ago, and he’d prefer RSGP rather then something I received as a gift and passed on.
